title: Discipline and prohibited acts (overview)
text: Detailed list of indiscipline: violent behaviour, abuse, publication of offensive material, gambling, exam malpractice, littering, mass bunking, possession/use of banned substances, assault, carrying weapons, discrimination, cybercrime, ragging, public display of affection etc.; penalties include fines up to INR 25,000, suspension, expulsion.

title: Prohibited items on campus
text: Tobacco, alcohol, narcotics, firearms, pornographic material, unauthorized tranquilisers and other objectionable materials are strictly banned; possession may lead to suspension, fines up to INR 25,000 and expulsion.

title: Sanctions & penalties
text: Minor sanctions: warning, apology, suspension of privileges, fines, forfeiture of deposit, community service. Major sanctions: debarment from exams, suspension, reimbursement for damage, expulsion.
